sources.title: 1945 Die Falsche Braut ( Joe Stöckel, Josef Eichheim, Beppo Brem)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1945. Die falsche Braut.  U.a mit Joe Stöckel,Josef Eichheim und Beppo Brem

metadata.Plot: Farmer Korbinian Assbichler has a lot of debts. Thus he decides that his son Toni has to marry Rosl the daughter of the rich Pius Mang. But Toni fears that Rosl could be an ugly girl and does not agree with his father's plan...
metadata.Actors: Elfriede Datzig, Josef Eichheim, Margarete Haagen
